pullRequest.title: [CDAP-17447] Emit bytes written metric for database sinks

commit.message: [CDAP-17447] Emit bytes written metric for database sinks

nodes.bodyText:
Given this new approach, couldnt we do the same for bytes read?
We probably shouldnt add it now but it might make sense to add the method to the interface with a TODO to add the counting later. What do you think?

nodes.bodyText: Is it possible for this writeToDB method to be called multiple times for the same DBRecord? If so the count would be incorrect right?
